sn47.50:1.5: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, tinnannam asavanam pahanaya cattaro satipatthana bhavetabba.
sn47.50:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaye kayanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam;
sn47.50:2.5: dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn47.50:2.6: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, tinnannam asavanam pahanaya ime cattaro satipatthana bhavetabba”ti.
